title: Flight Simulator 2020 - How to - ILS approach flight training - Why does it remain saying watch out?
description:
In this video we will look a the issue where you cannot complete the ILS approach flight training in MSFS 2020. This happens even if you perform a perfect landing which would normally be rated with an A.
